domains.title: üåê Domains to Look Up
domains.description: A list of domains or full URLs to inspect (e.g., apify.com, https://https://www.google.com/search?q=google.com/search). The tool will clean them automatically.

recordTypes.title: üîç Record Types to Query
recordTypes.description: Select the DNS record types you want to query.

performWhois.title: üë§ Perform WHOIS Lookup
performWhois.description: If checked, the Actor will also perform a WHOIS query to get registrar and expiration data. This is slower.

performHttpCheck.title: üö¶ Perform HTTP Status Check
performHttpCheck.description: If checked, the Actor will check the HTTP status code for both http:// and https://.

performSslCheck.title: üîí Perform SSL Certificate Check
performSslCheck.description: If checked, the Actor will check the SSL certificate for its issuer and expiration date.
